trans_title: 纳粹秘密基地 第二季
introduction: The final collapse of the Nazi regime in 1945 left as many questions as it did relics. This series will uncover and examine some of the most unusual and secret sites, as experts dissect and reveal the purpose of these bases, their makeup and technical design.S2 E1 - Inside the Terror FactoryS2 E2 - Underground SuperweaponsS2 E3 - Secrets of Vogelsang CastleS2 E4-Secret Nazi CityS2 E5 - Mystery Beneath the CastleS2 E6-Secrets of the Owl MountainsS2 E7 - Secret Relics of Nazi ResearchS2 E8 - Curse of Himmler's Castle
chinese_title: 纳粹秘密基地 第二季
